description:
Wage $16.00 an hour

We will never communicate with you via text message to discuss or schedule job interviews. We will never ask you for any personal information over the phone, via email or via text.

PHYSICAL DEMANDS

  • Maintain a professional appearance and properly wear company uniform.
  • Must have ability to safely lift minimum of 50 lbs. without restrictions.
  • Requires standing for long periods of time.


WORK ENVIRONMENT

  • Able to work flexible hours.
  • Noise level in the work environment is usually moderate to loud.
  • Adult content environment.
  • Must be at least 21 years of age.


Essential Duties And Responsibilities

  • As a Retail Clerk, you will be responsible for interacting with customers, ringing up sales transactions, and maintaining the visual appeal of the store.
  • Demonstrate consistent, reliable attendance and punctuality.
  • Assist customers with questions and/or merchandise selection.
  • Handle sales transactions.
  • Present all merchandise in the most favorable manner possible to all customers and maintain product displays as required.
  • Maintain a clean work area at all times.
  • Acknowledge and greet customers in a friendly and courteous manner.


Qualification Requirements

  • Previous retail experience helpful.
  • Ability to handle cash, credit and check transactions accurately.


EDUCATION/FORMAL TRAINING

  • A High School diploma or general education degree.


REASONING ABILITY

  • Ability to carry out detailed tasks and projects with minimal direction or supervision. Self Starter is a plus!


Language Skills

  • Strong interpersonal skills and ability to build positive working relationships.
  • Able to read, write, and speak English.


CERTIFICATES, LICENSES, REGISTRATIONS

  • NA
